channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BEwY8uZ4BAI

Ik that this is late, but my brother just showed this to me. Rip all those who died.

item.title: Heartbreaking 9-11 video
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“TheCyberMan, post:52, topic:414629”][quote author=Stork link=topic=516591.msg3754147#msg3754147 date=1316291961]

Stork you’re a fucking idiot. Its a shame that the death toll of Iraq innocents didn’t become a popular public trend until around 2006-7, everyone here was for the war UP UNTIL people started to realize we were getting nothing done, and once people realized the innocent death toll they were completely against the war and protest it constantly.

Dont act like WE _ THE _ AMERICAN _ PEOPLE told our government to go over there and kill women and children. It wasn’t even our governments prime motive but collateral damage seems to not bother them.

Well I mean your country voted Bush in twice, dunno what you expected really.
[/quote]We went to Iraq to fix their system up and give the people a foundation to form a civilized country on. Am I wrong? Yes, we may seem like a wanna be big daddy, but we did not want to harm the innocent people.[/quote]Wrong. You wanted a new dictator that could provide the US with natural resources and diplomatic power in the middle east. It’s been done before.

Read full topic

[/quote]
Well I mean your country voted Bush in twice, dunno what you expected really.[/quote]We went to Iraq to fix their system up and give the people a foundation to form a civilized country on. Am I wrong? Yes, we may seem like a wanna be big daddy, but we did not want to harm the innocent people.

you can’t milk a cow for 10 years.

yes, it was a tragedy, but you americans kinda screwed it up with the whole ‘invading iraq’ thing where you got a bunch of civilians killed for your own gain. Don’t expect any sympathy from the rest of the world dawgs - you kinda lost that one.

item.title: Heartbreaking 9-11 video
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“lostmyphat, post:10, topic:414629”][quote author=Frell link=topic=516591.msg3750414#msg3750414 date=1315972236]
If I ever worked in a building like that id keep a parachute in my desk. Im 100% serious I would not hesitate to leave the second anything happened.
[/quote]
Actually they’re rebuilding it. I would NEVER go into that building. I think it would be one of the largest targets for terrorists. Just image if they brought down the twin towers TWICE.[/quote]

They are rebuilding but making it more secure and not as big, we have a unite about this

item.title: Heartbreaking 9-11 video
item.dc:creator: @Vexx Vexx
item.description:
@Vexx wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:40, topic:414629”][quote author=vexx1345 link=topic=516591.msg3751349#msg3751349 date=1316048077]
Its sucks that atheist’s are trying to get New York to tear down some crosses that were made naturally from the towers blowing up. That is why I hate atheist’s.
[/quote]
It’s atheists who take it to the extreme. I’m agnostic (which is different from atheism) because I’ve had some pretty harsh life experiences but you don’t see me boycotting people from having a religion.[/quote]
I have heard they have gotten so bad most schools can’t even say the pledge because it has “god” in it. Atheist’s need to stop trying to make everyone feel sorry for them.

Read full topic

item.title: Heartbreaking 9-11 video
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

Frell:

probably a rumor, no one would go through that much trouble

The site is being rebuilt with five new skyscrapers and a memorial to the casualties of the attacks. As of September 2011, only one skyscraper has been completed with four more expected to be completed before 2020. A sixth tower is still awaiting confirmation to be built. At the time of their completion, the original 1 and 2 World Trade Center were the tallest buildings in the world, surpassing the Empire State Building, also in Manhattan.

Read full topic
